column6: Turkmengaz is the state-owned national gas company of Turkmenistan. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan.
column38: GAIL (India), Turkmengaz, Interstate Gas Systems, Afghan Gas Enterprise

column6: Nestle provides nutrition, health, and wellness products worldwide. Its brands include Nestle Health Science, Nestle Nespresso, Nestle Purina Petcare and Nestle Waters. The company was founded in 1866 and is based in Vevey, Switzerland.
column36: Ali Sadozai, president, (Afghanistan) "Our decision to operate directly and invest locally indicates our growing confidence in the region's economic opportunities."
